channel.title: Quetion about No-IP
channel.description: My server wont start with No-IP and I don't know why, I made an account with the DNS Host (A) and I started it and it has the smiley face on the downloaded version as if it is connected and I also edited my client and put in the right address but it still wont connect. I don't know if I'm doing something wrong.

item.title: Quetion about No-IP
item.dc:creator: @vic_08 Vic_
item.description:
@vic_08 wrote:

You have to portforward… You cant just expect the no-ip program to allow people to come online.

Read full topic

item.title: Quetion about No-IP
